alert.note: Alert for Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 4:18AM CDT until November 01 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River Near Galesville affecting La Crosse and Trempealeau Counties. Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Yellow River at Necedah affecting Juneau County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yellow River at Necedah. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 16.5 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. this afternoon at 430 PM CDT.
